protein.specific_function: Positively regulates PTEN protein stability through phosphorylation of PTEN on 'Tyr-336', which in turn prevents its ubiquitination and degradation possibly by reducing its binding to NEDD4. May function as a tumor suppressor

go_class.description: non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine kinase activity
